mapper.select: /* selectSocialMediaKeys */ SELECT smkey_idx, sm_name, sm_appkey, sm_secretkey, account_id, useyn, sm_etc1 as etc1, regmemid, updmemid, delmemid, regdt, upddt, deldt, exp1 as exp FROM t_smkeys WHERE delyn='N' AND SITE_CODE = #{siteCode}
mapper.insert: /* insertAccessToken */ INSERT INTO t_smaccesstoken ( site_code, sm_name, sm_accesstoken, sm_accessible, sm_userid, sm_issueDate ) VALUES ( #{siteCode}, #{smName}, #{smAccesstoken}, #{smAccessible}, #{smUserid}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.update: /* markNoUse */ UPDATE t_smkeys SET useyn = #{useyn}, delmemid = #{delmemid}, deldt = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE sm_name = #{smName}
mapper.select:
/* getSocialMediaUsingList */ SELECT k.sm_name, k.sm_appkey, k.sm_secretkey, k.useyn, k.sm_etc1, t.sm_etc2, k.regmemid, k.updmemid, k.delmemid, k.regdt, k.upddt, k.deldt, t.site_code, t.sm_accesstoken, t.sm_accessible, t.sm_userid, t.sm_issueDate
FROM (select * from t_smaccesstoken where site_code=#{siteCode}) t right outer join t_smkeys k on t.sm_name=k.sm_name
FROM t_smaccesstoken t right outer join t_smkeys k on t.sm_name=k.sm_name
WHERE k.useyn = 'Y' AND k.delyn != 'Y'
mapper.insert: /*insertSocialProgramProc*/ INSERT INTO t_smprogram ( smpro_idx, menu_code, smkey_idx, useyn, prom_text )VALUES( T_SMPROGRAM_SEQ.nextval, #{menuCode}, #{smkeyIdx}, #{useyn}, #{promText} )
mapper.select: /* getSocialProgramSet */ SELECT k.smkey_idx, k.sm_name, k.sm_appkey, k.sm_secretkey, k.account_id, k.sm_etc1, k.exp1, p.smpro_idx, p.useyn, p.prom_text FROM t_smkeys k LEFT JOIN t_smprogram p ON k.smkey_idx = p.smkey_idx WHERE k.delyn = 'N' and p.menu_code = #{schOpt1}

/* getSocialProgramSetInfo */ SELECT k.smkey_idx , k.sm_name , k.sm_appkey , k.sm_secretkey , k.account_id , k.sm_etc1 , k.exp1 FROM t_smkeys k WHERE k.delyn = 'N' and k.site_code = #{etc1} and k.sm_name = #{schOpt3}
